title: Individual Activity 1
section: ğŸ“ Sample One-Page MBA Portfolio Text
text:
ğŸ“ Sample One-Page MBA Portfolio Text

Kirti Sharma MBA Candidate, 2025 | Vancouver, BC LinkedIn.com/in/kirti-sharma | kirti@email.com | GitHub.com/kirti-code (optional)


PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Driven MBA student with a unique academic foundation in bioinformatics and zoology, combined with experience in educational leadership and programming. Currently serving as Assistant Director at Mathnasium West Vancouver, where I manage operations, mentor staff, and lead student learning outcomes. Adept at blending analytical thinking with real-world problem solving. Passionate about transitioning into data analytics to merge technical expertise with strategic business insights.



CORE COMPETENCIES
Data Analysis â€¢ Business Strategy â€¢ Python â€¢ SQL (Basic) â€¢ Leadership â€¢ Communication â€¢ Tableau â€¢ Excel â€¢ Team Development â€¢ Problem Solving



EXPERIENCE
Assistant Centre Director, Mathnasium | Vancouver, BC 2023 â€“ Present

Lead operational planning, staff scheduling, and performance tracking across student programs
Designed and improved workflows for onboarding and progress reporting, increasing efficiency by 20%
Coach a team of instructors while building strong relationships with parents and students

Online Programming & Math Instructor 2019 â€“ 2022

Delivered custom lessons in Python and math for international students across different grade levels
Developed and revised curriculum content aligned with learner needs and progress metrics




EDUCATION
Master of Business Administration (MBA) University Name, Canada â€“ Expected 2025
M.Sc. Zoology & B.Sc. Bioinformatics University Name, India



PROJECTS

Customer Segmentation using K-Means Clustering â€“ Cleaned and analyzed sales data to build actionable customer groups; tools used: Python, pandas, matplotlib
AI Proposal for Educational Centers â€“ Wrote a strategy paper on implementing AI at Mathnasium, integrating change management models like Kotterâ€™s 8-Step




CAREER INTERESTS
Iâ€™m exploring roles at the intersection of education, data, and strategyâ€”whether that means becoming a data analyst, a tech-savvy educator, or building my own ed-tech business. Iâ€™m especially drawn to projects that involve storytelling through data and driving smarter decisions in learning-focused organizations.

Let me know if youâ€™d like a custom HTML, Quarto, or Canva version of this design!
